/icons/ai + machine learning/00028-icon-.name: Batch AI
/icons/ai + machine learning/00028-icon-.description: Automates end-to-end AI model training, testing, and deployment in large-scale environments

/icons/ai + machine learning/00030-icon-.name: Machine Learning Studio (Classic) Web Services
/icons/ai + machine learning/00030-icon-.description: Deploy machine learning models as RESTful web services to integrate with other applications

/icons/ai + machine learning/00031-icon-.name: Genomics
/icons/ai + machine learning/00031-icon-.description: Azure Genomics enables scalable, high-performance genomics analysis and interpretation for research and clinical applications.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00792-icon-.name: Computer Vision
/icons/ai + machine learning/00792-icon-.description: Azure Computer Vision is a cloud-based API that extracts valuable insights from images, such as text recognition, facial detection, and more.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00793-icon-.name: Custom Vision
/icons/ai + machine learning/00793-icon-.description: Build, train, and deploy custom computer vision models to classify images or detect objects

/icons/ai + machine learning/00794-icon-.name: Face APIs
/icons/ai + machine learning/00794-icon-.description: Azure Face APIs enable facial recognition, detection, and analysis in applications, using machine learning-based models to identify and verify identities.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00795-icon-.name: Content Moderators
/icons/ai + machine learning/00795-icon-.description: Automatically moderate user-generated content in real-time to ensure it meets community guidelines and standards.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00796-icon-.name: Personalizers
/icons/ai + machine learning/00796-icon-.description: Azure Personalizers uses machine learning to provide personalized experiences by predicting the most likely next action or outcome for each user.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00797-icon-.name: Speech Services
/icons/ai + machine learning/00797-icon-.description: Azure Speech Services enables developers to build intelligent speech solutions that can recognize, transcribe, and synthesize speech across multiple languages and formats.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00799-icon-.name: QnA Makers
/icons/ai + machine learning/00799-icon-.description: Build conversational interfaces that answer customer questions, using natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00800-icon-.name: Translator Text
/icons/ai + machine learning/00800-icon-.description: Azure Translator Text provides machine learning-based automatic translation for text in over 60 languages, with high-quality translations and customizable settings.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00801-icon-.name: Language Understanding
/icons/ai + machine learning/00801-icon-.description: Azure Language Understanding (LUIS) enables natural language processing (NLP) for chatbots, voice assistants, and other applications to understand user intent and extract relevant information.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00812-icon-.name: Immersive Readers
/icons/ai + machine learning/00812-icon-.description: Enhance digital reading experiences by providing 3D immersive views of text, images, and other multimedia content.

/icons/ai + machine learning/00814-icon-.name: Anomaly Detector
/icons/ai + machine learning/00814-icon-.description: Detects anomalies in time series data to identify unusual patterns or outliers

/icons/ai + machine learning/00819-icon-.name: Form Recognizers
/icons/ai + machine learning/00819-icon-.description: Extracts data from forms, such as names, addresses, phone numbers, and dates, to automate business processes.

/icons/ai + machine learning/01688-icon-.name: Azure Object Understanding
/icons/ai + machine learning/01688-icon-.description: Automatically identifies objects within images using computer vision techniques.

/icons/ai + machine learning/02409-icon-.name: Metrics Advisor
/icons/ai + machine learning/02409-icon-.description: A fully managed, machine learning-based service that analyzes metrics data to identify anomalies, trends, and patterns, and provides recommendations for optimization.

/icons/ai + machine learning/02749-icon-.name: Azure Applied AI Services
/icons/ai + machine learning/02749-icon-.description: Azure Applied AI Services provides pre-trained AI models for computer vision, natural language processing, and decision-making, allowing developers to build AI-powered applications without extensive machine learning expertise.

/icons/ai + machine learning/02876-icon-.name: Language
/icons/ai + machine learning/02876-icon-.description: Azure Language uses AI-powered natural language processing (NLP) to analyze, generate, and translate text.

/icons/ai + machine learning/03173-icon-.name: Cognitive Services Decisions
/icons/ai + machine learning/03173-icon-.description: A decision-making platform that uses machine learning to analyze data and make recommendations

/icons/ai + machine learning/03321-icon-.name: Serverless Search
/icons/ai + machine learning/03321-icon-.description: Azure Cognitive Search enables serverless search capabilities for applications, providing scalable and cost-effective searching of large amounts of data.

/icons/ai + machine learning/03390-icon-.name: Content Safety
/icons/ai + machine learning/03390-icon-.description: Azure Content Safety detects and classifies explicit content in images, videos, and text to help organizations comply with industry regulations and community standards.

/icons/ai + machine learning/03438-icon-.name: Azure OpenAI
/icons/ai + machine learning/03438-icon-.description: Azure OpenAI enables you to integrate OpenAI's AI models into your applications, including text generation, completion, and classification.

/icons/ai + machine learning/03513-icon-.name: AI Studio
/icons/ai + machine learning/03513-icon-.description: A cloud-based environment for building, training, and deploying custom AI models

/icons/ai + machine learning/10044-icon-.name: Cognitive Search
/icons/ai + machine learning/10044-icon-.description: Cloud-based search service that indexes, ranks, and retrieves data from various sources

/icons/ai + machine learning/10162-icon-.name: Cognitive Services
/icons/ai + machine learning/10162-icon-.description: Azure Cognitive Services enables developers to build intelligent applications that can see, hear, understand, and interact with users using AI-powered features.

/icons/ai + machine learning/10164-icon-.name: Genomics Accounts
/icons/ai + machine learning/10164-icon-.description: Cloud-based genomics service for analyzing and processing large-scale genomic data

/icons/ai + machine learning/10165-icon-.name: Bot Services
/icons/ai + machine learning/10165-icon-.description: Enables you to build, deploy, and manage intelligent bots that interact with users via popular messaging platforms.

/icons/ai + machine learning/10166-icon-.name: Machine Learning
/icons/ai + machine learning/10166-icon-.description: Build, deploy, and manage machine learning models to analyze data and make predictions

/icons/ai + machine learning/10167-icon-.name: Machine Learning Studio Workspaces
/icons/ai + machine learning/10167-icon-.description: A collaborative environment for data scientists to build, train, and deploy machine learning models

/icons/ai + machine learning/10168-icon-.name: Machine Learning Studio Web Service Plans
/icons/ai + machine learning/10168-icon-.description: Create, deploy, and manage web services for machine learning models
